website_summaries.verdict: Despite its smaller capacity, this machine hosts a wide variety of features and settings.
pros: Features an LED status display and a transparent top
5-cycle selector, with a choice of 3 water levels
Holds up to 6.6 pounds of laundry
Auto-shutoff if the lid opens, and automatic load balancing
cons: Capacity is less than other options
Reports of some of these breaking within a few months

customer_reviews.title: Used over a month, still works great.
customer_reviews.text: Works great and holds more than I thought it would. we've had it for over a month and have done four or more loads a week. it started leaking but the drain hose was detached a little bit and the cause of our issue. pushed it in until it clicked and it fixed the problem. bottom is a little difficult to put on and took some time to figure out how it went, but other than that, it works perfectly and saves us a trip!
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Lasted two washes
customer_reviews.text: This item broke after three washes. The spin cycle sounds like there is some loose metallic piece flying around. I've tried minimizing loads and rebalancing to no avail. I hate warranties. I would rather just get a product that works... Hence why I went with B&D but I must have received a dud.
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: and it performed great! No shaking at all
customer_reviews.text: Just got this little cutie and set it up. Did a test load, and it performed great! No shaking at all, level out of the box during entire load. I was worried that the drain hose would be too much for the small bathroom sink but it all kept up and drained properly. Very happy with this purchase. I am going to buy a second one of these for a small in-law suite I have at my house. High marks all around. Black & Decker is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: A.E.P.

customer_reviews.title: I've only had it a few days and only run two loads but I love this little machine
customer_reviews.text: Where do I start? I've only had it a few days and only run two loads but I love this little machine! I read reviews for this machine and other similar ones before buying and took some tips from them. It's very quiet and easy to use. The only trouble I had was finding the right parts to adapt the hose to my kitchen sink. I have a built in hose sprayer which isn't a standard size. So I went to the plumbing department at home depot and after about 20 minutes with the associate there comparing my sprayer and the hose to the various adapters, I had the right part. I'll update the review if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: TMN

customer_reviews.title: Poor product and nonexistent customer support
customer_reviews.text: In short, it's a terrible product and none existent customer support. The washer is a piece of total junk. The drain is automatic, but when water from the drum is completely drained, the washer is never able to realizes this and goes to "Error 4". I called the helpline to get their take, but after waiting for 15min I realized that help line is run by a 3rd party provide called Equity Brands. Equity Brands was totally unhelpful, said someone from B&D will call in 2 days... and that was 4 days ago.
customer_reviews.author: haochen

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love It
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this machine and I absolutely love it. It’s perfect for those who are single. I was tired of sharing a machine and have to go up and down a few flights of stairs. It washes more than I thought. The only thing is the water hose and drain hose are kinda short, but those are easy fixes. No leaking yet, but I will wait awhile and write another review.
customer_reviews.author: Carolynn

customer_reviews.title: Small loads and cold water only.
customer_reviews.text: Great machine for apartment, thought it might not be all that good, but was pleasantly surprised. Does an even better job than our regular washer at home, just much smaller loads. I'm able to do about 3 days worth of clothes at one shot. Very pleased. Light enough that i was able to carry it up one flight by myself, yet once set up it doesn't wobble or move, even when spinning fast. It says you can only use HE powder, which I couldn't find, so I've used just a very little HE liquid and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: JFD

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even last 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Less then 3 months and it stopped working. It Will constantly fill and drain at the same time then go to an error message. I tried everything. I have been on hold trying to contact black + Decker for over an hour. Update' emailed and called black+decker multiple times and still ignored.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: The second unit arrived and it seems to be working perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: The first unit I ordered was dead on arrival. There was an extremely loud metal grinding / ringing sound coming from the unit. Upon looking at the underside, there was a round metal plate near the motor belt, and it looked like the welding came apart. The piece was loose and banging around whenever the motor moved. So I returned that unit as defective, and ordered another. The second arrived and it seems to be working perfectly. No terrible sounds, it runs surprisingly quiet. The capacity is rather small, but that was expected. I'm glad I gave it a second chance.
customer_reviews.author: Luke R.

customer_reviews.title: Not to bad
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and setup washed the clothes really well not soaking wet when done. Only minor issue slight leaking UPDATE: flooded my bathroom after a month of use
customer_reviews.author: shawna knipe

customer_reviews.title: Good machine for apartment!
customer_reviews.text: Came on time! Brand new. Quite sound and light weighted. I am so happy that my 10 years old son is doing his own laundry. Cleans clothes very good and spins too. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Please read..
customer_reviews.text: It’s smaller than i thought. It makes so much banging noise. I tested out what’s making that noise, everytime i use hot/warm water and if i put more than half of the tub. I ordered one and it makes so much noise. It also looked like its been used. So i thought ill just exchange it due to the very loud banging noise. then i exchanged it with a new one and it still does the same. I reported and asked help from Amazon support and its not that much help. Will not recommend. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Espiritu

customer_reviews.title: Powerful , compact, and cleans good!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that it is portable. I can move it around to where I need it and store it when I don’t. I didn’t want to go to the laundry mat with the pandemic going on and have to sanitize everything I touched. It makes life easier. It cleaned my clothes really good. Only thing is you can’t wash a big load, but if you wash a little load at a time, you should be good.
customer_reviews.author: Fela

customer_reviews.title: Leaks a little, where is the Pump filter?
customer_reviews.text: This little machine works, washes clothes and don't leak in the first week. Then, some water (maybe half a cup) would leak from the bottom during each wash. Also, I checked the manual. We are supposed to clean the pump filter every month. However, I opened the portal finding no filter there??? Does the assembly guy forgot to put a filter there? Will the pump die prematurely because of the lack of a filter? I'm worried.
customer_reviews.author: Rui Li

customer_reviews.title: Very loud spinning caused by loose screws
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered yesterday and I put it though 2 washes. Everything’s fine until the spinning started, it was so loud it sounded like there was construction going on inside my bathroom. My stepdad took apart the back panel and found that the metal guard around the spinning mechanism was complete loose. The screws were there but they were barely in, when the clothes spun the metal part shook and caused the racket. Not sure if it was loosened in the shipping process or wasn’t tightened properly in the factory. Either way, He tightened them and now it works great, not loud at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Little Washer
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to commit to a large expensive washer and this washer was perfect. Easy maneuverability due to the small size, simple quick setup, and delivery right to the door without waiting a week like most larger stores. I was surprised how quiet it is and how little it shakes despite all the movement happening in the tub. It's actually quieter and stays still better than my old full size washer. I've already recommended it to all my friends, cannot recommend enough!
customer_reviews.author: Be

customer_reviews.title: Great little washer!
customer_reviews.text: So far this washer has been one of the best purchases I’ve made. It gets the clothes clean. No residue of soap. Even though the load size is restricted, I still think it’s great. I would buy again. I bought this bc I am living in a rental where the washer went out and the landlord is not inclined to repair or replace at the moment. Absent of repairing/ replacing with my own funds, I had two choices. Find a washer or laundromat. This was the more economical option. Now I will have a washer with me wherever I go. :)
customer_reviews.author: WolfGj

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for avoiding laundromats
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I have ever made. I couldn’t stand to go to friends house or laundry mat, and my apartment rental doesn’t have washer hookup. This little guy holds a lot of weight and everything comes out almost dry. Super easy to install, doesn’t take up much space and it’s a mini real washing machine. I use it A LOT and it’s doing great.
customer_reviews.author: mshairyface

customer_reviews.title: A time and money saver

We're able to wash everything from jeans, sweatshirt, bathroom mats, and sheets and pillowcases (queen size...though in two separate loads). Instead of waiting until we reach "critical mass", we do several smaller loads throughout the week. Using the machine beats going to a dank basement shared by an entire apartment building or using pickup laundry service--especially since the pandemic hit. Set up was easy, and the machine is very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Pgood

customer_reviews.title: great support

First they gave me to the technicians and they don't care but Susan Westervelt was the person to go to because she went above and beyond! I would buy from them again and I would recommend. It's great for a small unit and it works very well. Highly recommend. Especially with having the great support I received from Susan Westervelt!
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money

customer_reviews.title: Excellent washing machine (great for small apartments/studios)

Only thing I wish is that they had some type of custom mounting system to connect to faucets. Had a hard time finding something to connect to my faucet. Aside from that, worth every penny. Highly recommend.

But I decided to go with Black and Decker because the make a great product and I wouldn’t go with a product line that didn’t stand behind their product. Wow! This machine cleans so well that it matches the cleanliness of my GE large scale front loaders on handling the cleanliness of laundry. It also is rather quiet. I’ve learned it’s capacity and with two adults and two babies under two I can handle our laundry by washing one load every other day. It also wrings the laundry out just as well as the bigger sets. It’s easy to use and set up.
customer_reviews.author: A N

customer_reviews.title: Love it and worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I was really scared because there were lots of mix feelings based on the reviews. But it arrived fine and with no problems. I can honestly say this washing machine is worth it, specially if you live in a small apartment and for a small family. For an amount of clothing from two people in a week you can finish up washing your clothes in the same day! I honestly love it and is money well spent. It’s been 4 months so far. I will continue updating if necessary.

That turned out to be a good thing, because now clothes don't accumulate and stink in the basket, you can now have small loads without concern of spending a lot of water or electricity.

I will warn you, you might have to buy an adapter for your kitchen sink, but I was able to order that off amazon. Not noisy at all & holds a lot more laundry than I expected. Cleans our clothes super well! If you’re looking for a compact dryer that’s similar to a full size, this one is it!

customer_reviews.title: If you dont mind leaking water..

But..like many reviews...I started to see water on the ground. While it was very little to begin with it has GOTTEN TERRIBLE. I have to use multiple towels to prevent water running everywhere on the floor. Throwing it away pending customer service....will update!

customer_reviews.title: Compact, easy setup, effective cleaning, quiet

It does make some noise if it's overloaded, but that's a user error, not a flaw in the product. Clothes are less wet when they come out of this than from the commercial machine I used to use. They dry very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Daley

customer_reviews.title: Efficient, powerful and easy to use. Great machine!

It is a quiet machine, clothes always come out clean and the spin cycle is so effective that my clothes are almost dry! It is lightweight and is easy to maneuver. I would highly recommend it.

product_meta.title: Black + Decker BPWM09W Portable Washer
product_meta.description: Are you tired of the old-fashioned washer and drying machines? Do you find it difficult to schlep your laundry from your basement room or from your apartment laundry room? Or perhaps you need to supplement your current washer and dryer with something smaller and more compact. If this sounds like you, then the BLACK+DECKER Portable Washer might be the solution to your cleaning problems. Popular among urban city dwellers who are short on space, this automatic compact washer cleaner is perfect for apartments as you can set up this machine and connect it to your kitchen sink. Stores easily and can be tucked neatly in a corner for a minimal space taking, you can take this washer with you on your weekend or overnight camping trip, even that RV getaway. Parents have also used this mini auto washer to clean baby bibs, messy kid’s clothes after burping and feedings. Send this to your son or daughter who is away at college for a dorm room necessity to do laundry. Get a loved one this small washing machine as a wonderful gift that is sure to put a smile on their face while saving them a trip to the community laundry room to clean dirty laundry.
feature_bullets: SMALL PORTABLE WASHING MACHINE – Ideal for camping trips & RVs, apartments, & boats or dorms, our clothes washer is compact but powerful. It's easily stored or moved in small spaces, & connects to a faucet with the INCLUDED drain hose & sink adapter

CONVENIENT DESIGN & LARGE CAPACITY - With a .9 cu. ft. tub that washes up to 6,6 lbs. of laundry in 19-52 minutes, this top loading portable washer machine (17.7 x 18.1 x 31.5 in.) has an easy to use LED digital display panel & a clear top window

5 CYCLE PROGRAMS & 3 WATER SETTINGS – Meet all your laundry needs with Heavy, Gentle, Normal, Rapid & Soak cycles. Control the Wash, Rinse, and Spin cycles with the push of a button. You can also adjust the water level based on load size

ENERGY EFFICIENT OPERATION – This compact washing machine is only for use with cold water. It has a built in lint-filter that does not need to be replaced - just clean it about once a month. It’s designed for high efficiency (HE) detergents only

AUTOMATIC UNBALANCE DETECTION- To avoid annoying vibration if the laundry inside the stainless steel tub is not distributed equally, this washer has an automatic unbalance detection mechanism that corrects imbalance in the tub automatically
